work.title: Real Impact.
work.subtitle: Success stories from our studio. Products that move the needle.

lumiso-crm.title: Lumiso CRM
lumiso-crm.solution: A SaaS platform for photographers and studios that manages the entire customer journey from lead to gallery delivery in a single panel. Combines session scheduling, project tracking, payment/deposit management, and client communication end-to-end.
bullets: Advanced filtering, search, and reporting screens
Gallery sharing, client selection, and delivery workflows

naapim.title: Naapim?
naapim.solution: An anonymous decision support experience that understands the user's context at the moment of decision and generates personalized insights. Structures the decision process with LLM-based analysis, semantic matching, and return flows.
bullets: Question classification and analysis generation with LLM integration
Semantic matching via vector distance (pgvector) and similar story/outcome suggestions
Email functions: code delivery, scheduled reminders, and follow-up flows
Return flow experience and personalized result screen
Anonymous usage and lightweight onboarding flow

serviceops-platform.title: ServiceOps Platform
serviceops-platform.solution: An AI-powered operations system for service professionals that manages appointments, payments, and invoicing in one platform. Guarantees collection, reduces no-show rates, and automates revenue flow.
bullets: AI model predicting appointment cancellation and delay risk
Dynamic reminder scheduling based on user behavior
Smart reporting for workload and revenue forecasting
Automatic capacity recommendations for service providers

founder.quote:
Software agencies often forget one thing:
Code is just a means to an end.
founder.p1: I started Agens to end the disconnect between engineering and strategy. Great code means nothing if the product fails.
founder.p2: We act as your technical co-founder. We challenge assumptions and obsess over user experience until your vision thrives.
founder.name: Togay Aytemiz

studio.title:
Not a factory.
A product studio.
studio.p1: We are a purpose-built digital product studio. Small, autonomous squads outperform fragmented agencies.
studio.p2: We cap active projects to ensure total immersion. Boutique craft meets elite engineering.

squad.footer: Fusion of engineering, design, and AI.
